txt.en: Beneath the lost Rhudaran temple in the Trollshaws, the Gaunt-lord Ferndúr creates a deadly plague to decimate the people of the north.\n\nYou must defeat him before it can be unleashed.
Discover the entrance to the Lost Temple
To earn this deed, you must defeat Ferndúr the Virulent.
You have defeated Ferndúr the Virulent
